dialogueLines.Text: Hey, /Player/. Good to see you. Glad you got my message.
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT

dialogueLines.Text: What's happening? You said you saw something to the west?
dialogueLines.Speaker: PLAYER

dialogueLines.Text: Yeah. The clouds on the horizon seem darker than the thunderheads above us right now. I'm not sure what's going on yet, but they don't look good.
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT

dialogueLines.Text: Not yet. They probably don't know.
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT

dialogueLines.Text: Anyway, I wanted you here because I needed someone to light the warning towers. We don't want anyone getting caught in whatever's coming, and I've got to stay here to monitor everything.
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT

dialogueLines.Text: Got it. I'll radio when it's done.
dialogueLines.Speaker: PLAYER

dialogueLines.Text: Thanks, kid. See you on the other side, then.
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT

dialogueLines.Text: It's gotten chillier since I left, but that's the last one lit.
dialogueLines.Speaker: PLAYER

dialogueLines.Text: This is /Player/, calling in. Warning towers are lit, and I'm headed back to the Lookout. Over.
dialogueLines.Speaker: PLAYER

dialogueLines.Text: Roger, kid. But head back into town. It's getting dicey out here and you've been out for a week.
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT

dialogueLines.Text: You sure you'll be fine by yourself?
dialogueLines.Speaker: PLAYER

dialogueLines.Text: I've been monitoring this land for twice as long as you've been alive. No need to worry about me.
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT

dialogueLines.Text: Fine. But I'm coming out first thing in the morning.
dialogueLines.Speaker: PLAYER

dialogueLines.Text: Of course, kid, I wouldn't expect anything less. G'night. I'll see you in the--
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT

dialogueLines.Text: Worse than -- thought -- go back and tell Mayor --
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT

dialogueLines.Text: I'm not leaving you out there. I can be there in thirty minutes and then--
dialogueLines.Speaker: PLAYER

dialogueLines.Text: No, kid, let me -- make sure you tell -- worse --
dialogueLines.Speaker: LOOKOUT
